data.message: So, uh... with your new iOS update, how do you react to comments that are just photos? Just tapping on them like other comments only enlarges the photo; tapping and holding does nothing unless the photo is enlarged, and then it only brings up the usual "save photo", "report", etc. option set. Halp?

replies.message: Here! To react to a photo comment, hover over "Like" and choose a reaction. If you're not seeing that option, please let us know by reporting a problem: http://bit.ly/2rGRXgS. -Aurora

Here's how I react to some posts. I use my "wow" face. Or sometimes I start laughing and put "lol" in the comments section. Every once in a while a sad post shows up and my eyes water. My suggestion for reactions would be taking a selfie while you're reacting and post it. Or if it was a quick reaction, just re-enact it and take a selfie.
